Package com.harmonia.client

Class PublicMessageClient

java.lang.Object
com.harmonia.client.PublicMessageClient
public class PublicMessageClient extends Object
This class provides a client to interact with the public message API of the Harmonia application. The client provides methods to retrieve all messages, send a new message, edit an existing message, and remove a message.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Harmonia Team

  • Method Details

    • getAllMessages

      public PublicMessagePO[] getAllMessages()
      Retrieves all public messages from the server.
      Returns:
      An array of PublicMessagePO objects representing all public messages in the system.

    • sendPublicMessage

      public PublicMessagePO sendPublicMessage(PublicMessagePO message)
      Sends a new public message to the server.
      Parameters:
      message - The PublicMessagePO object representing the message to be sent.
      Returns:
      The PublicMessagePO object representing the message that was sent.

    • removeMessage

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> removeMessage(Long pMessageId)
      Removes a public message from the server.
      Parameters:
      pMessageId - The ID of the message to be removed.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity object representing the result of the request to remove the message.

    • editPublicMessage

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> editPublicMessage(PublicMessagePO editMe)
      Edits an existing public message.
      Parameters:
      editMe - The PublicMessagePO object representing the message to be edited.
      Returns:
      The PublicMessagePO object representing the edited message.
